dboxSyncer
Runtime environment: Windows XP or later / .NET Framework 4.0 or later
Description: support bidirectional file synchronization, just use the computer as usual, the files will be uploaded or downloaded automatically according to the corresponding permission settings, provide efficient and convenient tools for file backup, sharing and collaboration.
Download dboxSyncer
Synchronization rules
  • Add new file locally, and the file does not exist on the network disk, automatically upload new files to network disk;
  • Local update file, and the file version does not exist on the network disk, automatically upload new version to network disk(save as new version);
  • Network disk storage file, and the file does not exist locally, automatically download to local;
  • Network disk update file, and the local file version is older, automatic download to local(overlay local file);
Tips: the synchronization rules will be processed according to the corresponding permissions of user and file;
Install / Uninstall
  • Install: enter the dboxSyncer folder, run as admin install.bat;
  • Uninstall: enter the dboxSyncer folder, run as admin uninstall.bat;
Tips: automatically run the synchronization tool at startup, and you can set up automatic login;
